description: Architectural boundaries for Timer application. Enforces clean separation between UI presentation, business logic (timer state management), and utilities. Prevents circular dependencies and ensures unidirectional data flow from core logic to UI.

forbidden.reason: UI components should not directly import utilities; use composition or props instead
UI layer must not perform file system operations
UI layer must not access filesystem paths
Core timer logic must be framework-agnostic and reusable
Core logic must not directly manipulate DOM or browser globals
Logic layer must not depend on UI components
Utilities must not import UI components
Utilities should be standalone helpers without business logic dependencies
Application entry points must not import test files
